Text: There's a bloke speaking Russian over the top of the soundtrack throughout the whole thing.  So if you're okay with a Russian bloke translating Kay Parker's lines, then it's fine.  Otherwise not.

There's a guy speaking Russian over the sound track.  I assume he's translating the dialogue.  If you don't mind Kay Parker's lines being spoken by a Russian bloke, then it's fine.  Otherwise, it's not.
